WRITING.TITLE: Made love to my wife last night, just like they do in the movies
WRITING.TEXT: I was fast, she was furious

WRITING.TITLE: An English teacher is giving a lesson on double negatives
WRITING.TEXT:
He says to the class: "One of the curious conventions of the English language is that two negatives always result in a positive statement; however, never do two positives result in a negative one."
A voice from the back of the room says, "Yeah right".

WRITING.TITLE: Gay parents are awesome!
WRITING.TEXT: * "Hey dad, why is my sister named rose?" * "Because your other dad loves roses" * "Thanks dad" * "No problem, Richard"

WRITING.TITLE: Why does Wheres Waldo wear stripes?
WRITING.TEXT: Because he doesn't want to be spotted

WRITING.TITLE: How to draw a Celtic knot
A marriage is a lot like a card game
WRITING.TEXT: In the beginning there's two hearts and a diamond but by the end you're looking for a club and a spade.

WRITING.TITLE: What's the difference between a guy with an Arts Major, and a guy with a Philosophy Major?
WRITING.TEXT: One will ask WHY you want fries with that!
